summary: Provides a Stable Diffusion latent diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts into RGB images together with corresponding depth maps, managing prompt encoding, latent initialization, guided denoising, optional safety verification, and extensibility through LoRA, textual inversion, and IP‑adapter fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Enables developers and creators to generate high‑quality images and depth information from natural language, supporting content creation, visual effects, AR/VR, and other applications that benefit from AI‑driven image synthesis with 3D awareness.
